DOC.brief_summary: Assessment of daily maintenance dose of Sifrol®, L-dopa sparing effect, effect on tremor, depression, anhedonia and tolerability
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Tolerability of Sifrol® (Pramipexole) in Patients With Advanced Idiopathic Parkinson's Disease
DOC.criteria: Patients with advanced idiopathic Parkinson's disease for whom combined treatment with Sifrol and Ldopa was indicated
